message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot more than that. Let me know if you're interested.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the condition of the product, but I can't go above $85. Looking forward to your response.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your offer. However, I can't go lower than $90. It's still a great price for the quality of this product. Let me know if you're interested in this price.
Hello Alice, I've been considering your offers and I think $87 would be a fair price for the product. Please let me know if this works for you.
